title: #124: Self-Discipline & Personal Effectiveness With Rory Vaden
description: Today I talk to business owner, author, and public speaker Rory Vaden about his two books, Take the Stairs and Procrastinate on Purpose. Rory and I talk about the principles that will help instill self-discipline in you and how you can be more effective with your time to leave a lasting legacy. Get out your pen and notebook. You'll want to take notes during this episode. Lots of great takeaways you can apply today.
author: contact@artofmanliness.com (The Art of Manliness)
